meanings.sent1: Adding spices can enrich the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard can enrich your knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The art exhibition will enrich the cultural scene of the city.
meanings.sent4: Her smile can enrich even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: Listening to music can enrich your emotions.

meanings.definition: To add nutrients or other substances to enhance the quality of something.
meanings.sent1: Including vitamins can enrich the nutritional value of the drink.
meanings.sent2: Using organic fertilizers can enrich the soil.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to enrich the soup with fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like honey, enriching the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The painting was enriched with vibrant colors.
